content: darn knit quick and bulky mittens by aimee pelletier instructions materials with the us10 cast on 20 22 begin knitting in the round being careful not to twist when joining if doing magic loop or dpns no need yarn 1 skein rasta 90yards/150grams or for a marker the beginning of round is when the tail and working yarn other equivalent super bulky yarn meet up shown in colorway 863 zarzamora cuff work 10 rounds of a k1 p1 rib needles us10 & 11 double points or 36 circular for magic loop thumb gusset switch to us 11 notions tapestry needle & waste yarn row 1-3 knit row 4 k2 m1 k2 m1 knit to end of round row 5 & 6 knit row 7 k2 m1 k4 m1 knit to end of round gauge & size row 8 & 9 knit row 10 k2 place next 6 stitches on holder cast on 2 stitches 2 5 - 3 stitches per inch stockinette stitch onto right needle using backwards loop cast on then knit to end of round small large 3 75 4 finished hand row 11 + knit all rounds until hand measures about 9 from cast on measured flat edge or to top of your index finger abbreviations decrease top k=knit round 1 *k1 k2tog ssk k5 k6 repeat from * 1 more time p=purl round 2 *k2tog ssk k4 k5 repeat from * 1 more time k2tog=knit 2 stitches together round 3 *k2tog k4 k5 repeat from * 1 more time 10 sts ssk=slip first stitch from the left divide evenly onto 2 needles and graft remaining 10 12 stitches with needle to the right needle knitwise do kitchener stitch or finchley the same with the second stitch then going down through both stitches on thumb right needle knit both slipped stitches place the 6 stitches from waste yarn onto us11 needle pick up and knit 4 stitches along body of mitten begin working in the round off that needle rounds 1-8 knit m1= pick up the bar between the work more or less rounds until the thumb is covered needles from back to front and knit last round k2tog to end of round 5 6 stitches remain through the front of the stitch cut yarn thread through remaining stitches and weave in ends ©2020 darn knit anyway all rights reserved you are allowed to make a copy of this pattern for personal use only in whole or part editing and using the pattern as the basis for another pattern or as a template publishing transmitting emailing this pattern to others or posting online in whole or part is strictly prohibited darnknitanyway com 651 342 1386
